phrs.translation: 划独木舟的人, 划艇运动员, 独木舟

sentences.sentence: In a case reminiscent of the British canoeist who "returned from the dead" five years after he went missing, the man's wife said he had drowned while windsurfing on holiday in Greece.
sentences.translation: 在英国也发生过类似事件，一名单人艇运动员就曾在走失五年后“魂兮归来”。匈牙利人的妻子称丈夫在希腊度假玩滑板冲浪的时候不幸淹死了。
